tool_description: Provides real-time location tracking for packages using GPS data, scan events, and facility check-ins to give precise location updates.

include_gps.description: Whether to include GPS coordinates if available

location_precision.description: Location precision level (city, facility, vehicle, exact)

error_messages: Tracking number not found: The specified tracking number doesn't exist in the system.
Location data unavailable: No current location data available for this package.
GPS data restricted: GPS tracking not available for this shipment type.
Invalid precision level: Use one of [city, facility, vehicle, exact].
usage: Provide tracking_number and optionally set include_gps flag and location_precision level. The tool returns the most current location information available.

location_type.description: Type of location (facility, vehicle, delivery_address, etc.)

gps_coordinates.description: GPS coordinates if available and requested

distance_to_destination.description: Distance to final destination in miles
